body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.specimen.v1]/items[at0029]/value as T0_specimen_type,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.specimen.v1]/items[at0088]/value as T0_juno_sample_identifier,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.specimen.v1]/items[at0015]/value as T0_collection_date_time,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.specimen.v1]/items[at0042]/value as T0_specimen_quality_issue,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.specimen.v1]/items[at0041]/value as T0_adequacy_for_testing,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.specimen.v1]/items[at0045]/value as T0_comment
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.laboratory_test_result.v1]
  )
LIMIT
  1
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
